children.text: Looking for your next favorite drink or the perfect food pairing? Our Find a Recommendation feature is here to help! Whether you're in the mood for something new or trying to complement a meal, we've got you covered!

Explore our extensive collection of alcoholic beverages, carefully curated to satisfy every taste and occasion. Whether you're looking to stock up your home bar or trying to find the perfect bottle for a special event, we've got something for everyone!

		"id": {{inputId.text}},

		"price": {{inputPrice.text}},
		"amount": {{inputAmount.text}},
   "abv": {{inputABV.text}},
	 "top1Flavor": {{inputFlavor1.text}},
	 "top2Flavor": {{inputFlavor2.text}},
	 "top3Flavor":{{inputFlavor3.text}}
 }
